# nameAsString()

**Instance Method**

Gets the “friendly” name of HCI controller.

## Declaration

```swift
func nameAsString() -> String!
```

## Return Value

Returns NSString with the device name, nil if there is not one or it cannot be read.
title: nameAsString()
